mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.ORDER_NO, C.S_NAME ,A.PAYMENT_PRICE || ' 원' AS PAYMENT_PRICE, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_OUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE FROM THISORDER A LEFT JOIN THISORDERDTL B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY C ON B.S_NO = C.S_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND A.ORDER_NO = #{param2}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.R_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM ,C.R_NAME ,C.R_PRICE || '원' AS R_PRICE FROM THISORDER A LEFT JOIN THISORDERDTL B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTROOM C ON B.S_NO = C.S_NO AND B.R_NO = C.R_NO WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND A.ORDER_NO = #{param2}

SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(B.COUPON_NO),'0') || ' 원'AS COUPON_NO ,NVL(B.COUPON_DETAIL,'-') AS COUPON_NAME ,NVL(SUM(NVL(C.POINT_OUT,0)),0) || ' 포인트' AS POINT FROM THISORDER A LEFT JOIN TMSTCOUPON B ON A.COUPON_NO = B.COUPON_NO LEFT JOIN THISPOINT C ON A.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO AND A.M_NO = C.M_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{param2} AND A.M_NO = #{param1} GROUP BY B.COUPON_NO, B.COUPON_DETAIL
SELECT CODE AS REFUND_REASON_NO ,CODENAME AS REFUND_REASON_NAME FROM TMSTCODE WHERE GRPCODE = 9
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO THISREFUND ( REFUND_NO ,ORDER_NO ,REFUND_REASON ,REFUND_PRICE ,REFUND_PERCENTAGE ,STEP_FLAG ,STEP1_DATE ,STEP2_DATE ) SELECT DISTINCT (SELECT NVL(MAX(REFUND_NO),0) + 1 FROM THISREFUND) ,A.ORDER_NO ,#{param3} ,A.PAYMENT_PRICE ,NULL ,1 ,SYSDATE ,NULL FROM THISORDER A WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1} AND A.ORDER_NO = #{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.S_NO, A.S_IMG1, A.R_NAME, A.ORDER_NO, A.R_NO, A.STEP_FLAG, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_OUT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, A.REVIEW_FLAG FROM ( SELECT S.S_NO, S.S_IMG1, R.R_NAME, O.ORDER_NO, R.R_NO, O.REVIEW_FLAG, ( CASE WHEN RF.STEP_FLAG IS NOT NULL THEN RF.STEP_FLAG WHEN RF.STEP_FLAG IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(O.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 3 WHEN (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(O.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND O.REVIEW_FLAG = 'N' ) THEN 4 WHEN (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(O.CHECK_IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND O.REVIEW_FLAG = 'Y' ) THEN 5 END ) END ) AS STEP_FLAG, O.CHECK_IN_DATE, O.CHECK_OUT_DATE, O.ORDER_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE) AS ROW_NUM FROM THISORDER O LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON M.M_NO=O.M_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY S ON O.S_NO=S.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTROOM R ON O.S_NO=R.S_NO LEFT JOIN THISREFUND RF ON O.ORDER_NO = RF.ORDER_NO WHERE M.M_NO=#{param1} ) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISORDER O LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON M.M_NO=O.M_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY S ON O.S_NO=S.S_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTROOM R ON O.S_NO=R.S_NO WHERE M.M_NO=#{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISREVIEW WHERE M_NO = #{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TMSTEVENT E LEFT JOIN THISATTEND TA ON E.EVENT_NO = TA.EVENT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON TA.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} AND E.EVENT_FLAG = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TMSTEVENT E LEFT JOIN THISATTEND TA ON E.EVENT_NO = TA.EVENT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON TA.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} AND E.EVENT_FLAG = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISPOINT WHERE M_NO = #{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM THISUSECOUPON WHERE M_NO=#{param1}

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO, A.PHOTO_URL, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.LIKES, A.S_NAME, A.S_NO FROM ( SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.PHOTO_URL, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.LIKES, S.S_NAME, S.S_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO) AS ROW_NUM FROM THISREVIEW R LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON R.M_NO = M.M_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTSTAY S ON R.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} ) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}

SELECT A.POINT_NO, TO_CHAR(A.POINT_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS POINT_USEDATE, A.POINT_TYPE, A.POINT_IN, A.POINT_OUT, A.M_POINT FROM ( SELECT P.POINT_NO, P.POINT_USEDATE, P.POINT_TYPE, P.POINT_IN, P.POINT_OUT, M.M_POINT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY P.POINT_NO) AS ROW_NUM FROM THISPOINT P LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON P.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} ) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER, C.COUPON_NO, C.COUPON_QTY FROM THISCOUPON C LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON C.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER, UC.COUPON_NO, O.ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(UC.COUPON_USEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COUPON_USEDATE FROM TMSTMEMBER M LEFT JOIN THISORDER O ON O.M_NO=M.M_NO LEFT JOIN THISUSECOUPON UC ON O.COUPON_NO = UC.COUPON_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} AND COUPON_USEFLAG = 'Y' )WHERE ROW_NUMBER BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}

SELECT A.FILENAME2, A.EVENT_NO FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER, E.FILENAME2, E.EVENT_NO FROM TMSTEVENT E LEFT JOIN THISATTEND TA ON E.EVENT_NO = TA.EVENT_NO LEFT JOIN TMSTMEMBER M ON TA.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE M.M_NO = #{param1} AND E.EVENT_FLAG=2) A WHERE ROW_NUMBER BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}

SELECT A.FILENAME2, A.EVENT_NO FROM ( SELECT E.FILENAME2, E.EVENT_NO FROM TMSTEVENT E LEFT JOIN THISATTEND TA ON E.EVENT_NO = TA.EVENT_NO WHERE E.EVENT_FLAG = 3 AND ( E.M_NO1 = #{param1} OR E.M_NO2 = #{param1} OR E.M_NO3 = #{param1} ) ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
